potionbrewer:AcidPotion.NAME: AcidPotion
DESCRIPTIONS: Remove the target's Block and deal #b

potionbrewer:DiscountPotion.NAME: Discount Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: in your hand cost 0 this combat.

potionbrewer:HastePotion.NAME: Haste Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: Discard your hand, refill your energy, draw #b

potionbrewer:MidasPotion.NAME: Midas Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: Damage, if the enemy is defeated, gain #b

potionbrewer:NoxiousPotion.NAME: Noxious Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: Damage each time you play a card this turn.
